document_data.name: Swirling Leaves of Steel
document_data.mainbody: '''''Swirling leaves of steel''''' was an [[exploit]] that allowed a [[ranger]] wielding two melee weapons to attack all adjacent enemies in a spinning dance of blades.
document_data.Effects: Once per day, a ranger who learned this exploit could spin like a top with blades held out and  strike all adjacent enemies that he or she could see in the immediate surrounding circle.
